summary: The diff implements a Valentine UI in frontend/src/App.tsx with a Yes/No flow and styling tokens for a pink romantic theme, but it introduces unrequested Internet Identity/auth-related hooks and a backend file, and it does not show the required generated meme image asset being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the generated meme image to the frontend as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and load it directly from the frontend (do not fetch the image via the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: UI references /assets/generated/meme-good-choice.dim_800x800.png, but the diff summary does not show the actual image file being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication scaffolding (provider + hooks) added, despite being a stated non-goal.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists Internet Identity authentication/login flow as a non-goal, but the diff adds hooks and wraps the app with InternetIdentityProvider.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister file added even though backend changes are not required.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest states backend changes are not required; diff adds backend/main.mo.
